name: Almost an idle RPG
description:
Almost an idle RPG is a 2D idle game prototype with 1 v 1 combat.

The title says "Almost" as for the moment, there are 2 Heroes but no Classes and 5 types of Weapons but a Buy Progression. So it's neither 100% an RPG or an idle game, hence... "Almost".

The game is made for the theme "Minimal Interaction" with original Sounds, Art, Visual Effects, and Code.

Creators: Harshit Arora, Akshat Sultania, Soumya Verma, Sankalp Yaduwanshi

This prototype was made within 48 hours.
Hope you enjoy it!
